content: Unboxing uses the same process in reverse. Study the following code for a moment. The if statement requires a boolean primitive value, yet it was given a Boolean wrapper object. No problem! Java 1.5 will automatically unbox this.
stemmed: unbox use process revers . studi follow code moment . the statement requir boolean primit valu , yet given boolean wrapper object . No problem ! java 1.5 automat unbox .
